description: Application for non-material amendment of planning permission dated 27/07/2015, ref: PA/15/00019The amendments comprise;The northern basement extent of Plot F1 has been reduced. Secant piling has been introduced around Plot F1 to accommodate design development. The basement extent of Plot F1 has been extended underneath the road box, resulting in the rationalisation and redistribution of spaces. The extent of Basement 2 has been reduced underneath the road box within the north eastern area of the basement. Rationalisation and re-distributions of spaces result in amendments to Basement Level 1 below Plot F1. Car parking layout updated, with the number Accessible Parking bays remaining.Minor amendments to room categories in the southern area of the OPP Basement 2.
site_name: Wood Wharf RM04 (Development Zone T - Basement) Wood Wharf, Prestons Road, London
